name: Dual Assault
description:
This is a top-down bullet hell shooter with two ships, with coop local multiplayer and single player modes. In single player mode, you control both ships - the controls are linked. You can only decouple the ship controls for a short time.

The two ships depend on each other for their success: pickups grabbed by one ship are power ups for the other ship. How much risk will you take to help the other player?

Credits:

Programming, game design and sounds: Paul Bonsma
